name: Chicken Curry and Turmeric Salad Wrap
author: Christy Pruitt
summary: This chicken curry wrap is a low-calorie, high-protein, and fast meal option for people who are trying to eat healthy. The salad recipe has a playful twist on the spice flavors with the added turmeric and cayenne. You may refrigerate it to allow it to flavor through, or serve immediately.
ingredients: ½ cup light mayonnaise (such as Fred Meyer®)
1 pound cubed cooked chicken breast tenders (such as Foster Farms®)
½ cup raw slivered almonds, chopped
directions: Combine mayonnaise, lime juice, curry powder, turmeric, and cayenne pepper in a bowl
Fold in chicken, apple, and almonds
Spoon a scoop of chicken salad mixture in a line across the middle of each tortilla
Fold opposing edges of the tortillas to overlap the filling
Roll 1 of the opposing edges around the filling
